tool_description: Generates RF coverage maps showing signal strength, coverage areas, and service boundaries based on propagation calculations and antenna patterns.

antenna_pattern.description: Antenna gain pattern in dB at 1-degree intervals

propagation_model.description: Propagation model to use for calculations

coverage_radius_km.description: Maximum coverage radius to calculate in kilometers (1 to 100)

threshold_dbm.description: Minimum signal threshold for coverage boundary in dBm

include_terrain.description: Include terrain effects in coverage calculation

error_messages: Invalid transmitter coordinates: Latitude and longitude out of valid range.
Invalid antenna height: Height must be positive and reasonable (0.1 to 1000 meters).
Invalid power: Transmitter power out of typical range (-50 to 100 dBm).
Invalid frequency: Frequency must be within supported range (30 to 30000 MHz).
Invalid antenna pattern: Must contain exactly 360 gain values in dB.
Invalid coverage radius: Radius must be between 1 and 100 kilometers.
Invalid resolution: Resolution must be between 50 and 1000 meters.
Unknown propagation model: Specified model not supported.
Area too large: Requested coverage area exceeds computational limits.
usage: Provide transmitter location, power, frequency, antenna pattern, and propagation model. Set coverage radius and resolution for desired map detail. The tool generates comprehensive coverage predictions.

coverage_map.description: 2D array of received signal strength values in dBm

coordinate_bounds.description: Map boundaries as [min_lat, max_lat, min_lon, max_lon]

coverage_area_km2.description: Total coverage area above threshold in square kilometers

max_range_km.description: Maximum range achieving threshold signal strength

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of predicted area above threshold
